pr_title: DHFPROD-5636: User without hub-central-saved-query-user can use Explorer and SavedQueries dropdown is not displayed on Zero state page

timeline.bodyText: Why is this read-entity-model instead of save-entity-query? I think a comment would be helpful here, as it's unexpected that this isn't save-entity-query.
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: @rjrudin Reverted it back to normal. I misunderstood the scenario.
replies.author: rahulvudutala
